com.epimorphics.lda.renderers
Class StripPrefixes

java.lang.Object
  com.epimorphics.lda.renderers.StripPrefixes

public class StripPrefixes
extends Object

StripPrefixes provides a method for removing unnecessary prefixes from (a (shared) copy of) a model.

static com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model Do(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model a)
          Do returns a Model with the same contents as a but using only prefixes that have namespaces which are used inside a.

Method Detail

Do

public static com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model Do(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model a)
Do returns a Model with the same contents as a but using only prefixes that have namespaces which are used inside a. The actual triples are shared, so while construction requires a complete scan of the triples of a, it does not use (much) additional space.
